devaccesspanel.name: Developer Access Panel [DevAccessPanel]
devaccesspanel.description: A mod that aims to organise, add new cheats and simplify existing cheats.

tms.name: Teleport Memory System [TMS]
tms.description: A mod that aims to fix issues caused by teleport enabled usage and adds teleport configurability, disallow teleports in certain scenarios, etc.

masterspells.name: Sage of Mastery Magic + Alchemy
masterspells.description: A mod that adds 2 new Sages, 25 spells and 15 potions into the game. Requires the Spellbook Injector.

occulthybrid.name: Occult Hybrid Unlocker & Stabilizer
occulthybrid.description: A mod that allows transformations into hybrids and stabilize Secondary Form transformation for Hybrids.

spellcurses.name: SpellCurses [Predecessor of MasterSpells]
spellcurses.description: No one is gonna see this welp.

sage_mote_att.name: Sage Attractors, Magic Motes & Magic Runes
sage_mote_att.description: A mod that adds the Sage Attractors, Magic Motes and Magic Runes into the game.

batuu_allow.name: Allow Outfit + Occult Int in Batuu
batuu_allow.description: A mod that allows Regular Outfits and Occult Interactions in Batuu.

nofade_col.name: No Fade Columns
nofade_col.description: A mod that enables No Fade on Columns.

custom_vamp_perks.name: Custom Vampire Perks
custom_vamp_perks.description: A mod that adds a few perks into the game.

choose_your_own.name: Choose Your Own
choose_your_own.description: A mod that allows you to choose the clothing for certain interactions.

ttv.name: Travel To Venue
ttv.description: A mod that allows you to Travel to hidden lots and go to Vacation Worlds.

nooutfitchange.name: Force No Outfit Change
nooutfitchange.description: A mod that disallows changing of clothes when enabled.

celeb_dis_mod.name: Celebrity Disguise Modification
celeb_dis_mod.description: A mod that allow celebrities to disguise whilst on the fly.

unlock_recipes.name: Unlock Recipes
unlock_recipes.description: A mod that unlocks some obscure recipes.

immortal_mod.name: Immortality Modified
immortal_mod.description: A mod that alters the Immortality VFX to allow toggling of the VFX.

eff_mach.name: Effects Machine Reset Thingy
eff_mach.description: Well, Dr Gluon told me to make this mod.

bonehilda.name: Stay Longer, Bonehilda
bonehilda.description: A mod that makes Bonehilda stay in the lot until you leave the lot.

no_auto_lights.name: No Auto Lights on Haunted Lots
no_auto_lights.description: A mod that would stop lights becoming Auto-Lighted

lifestyles_fix.name: 3+ Lifestyles Fix
lifestyles_fix.description: A mod that fixes that 3+ Lifestyles issue.

purchase_odds.name: Purchase Oddities from a Certain Figure
purchase_odds.description: Allows the procurement of paranormal items from a specter.

para_fix.name: Paranormal Investigator Instance Startup Fix
para_fix.description: This mod potentially fixes an issue where no specters and accursed objects spawn on load.

nerf_dust_bunny.name: Nerf Dust Bunny Forage
nerf_dust_bunny.description: A mod that nerfs Dust bunny Forage to disallow obtaining any value of more than 1k.

sw_saber.name: Converted Lightsabers
sw_saber.description: A mod that makes Rey's and Kylo Ren's Lightsabers fully functional.

sci_obj_mod.name: Modified Scientist Objects
sci_obj_mod.description: A mod that allows former scientists to use Scientist Objects.

unlock_rewards.name: Unlock Rewards
unlock_rewards.description: A mod that unlocks rewards onto Sims.
